name: The Fuzz Soup
description: The first piece in Volume 2 of "Fuzzy Masterpieces" by RYZ. This volume explores Modern Art. We have grown accustomed to enjoying the world's masterpieces from afar, behind glass or ropes, so we have forgotten that there are other sensory experiences to them like texture.  I created "Fuzzy Masterpieces" with this idea in mind. To evoke the desire to touch these pieces, to run your virtual hands through all their fuzzy glory and enjoy  enjoy them as wonderfully furry works of art. 5120 x 5120px.
